amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC.___. ENERGY LOAN PROGRAM. No funds made available by this Act may be used for the Department of Energy's Loan Program Office.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohbit the use of funds for the Department of Energy's Loan Program Office.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stockman amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 282 (Roll no. 395).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Stockman amendment (A061) Failed by recorded vote: 140 - 282 (Roll no. 395).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A061) offered by Mr. Stockman.
